content: 75 meter bulky beret or 82 yard chunky tam formerly known as not another bulky beret pattern green hat worn by model knit with less then 1 skein malabrigo chunky with mod of 1x1 ribbing in stead of 2x2 light blue beret knit up with less then 1 skein debbie bliss donegal luxury tweed chunky without elastic thread in ribbing purple pompom version knit in local handspun/dyed a quick knit can be finished in less then 6 hours even by beginners and non-speed knitters a great stash buster or last minute gift why not both yardage does not include gauge swatch or pom pom u-tube pom pom tutorial comming soon yardage in title is approx may take up to 95 yards
